channel.title: Deobing Java in its various forms :/
channel.description:
Id like to know how to 'deob', so I can get the latest version of RS when it comes out, i also want to deob some other java games, so that i can mess around them.
I do understand i may just about to be flamed by those tyrants of this board, please try and be contructive :) we all start somewhere :D
I further understand, a first post asking for you guys help, is not very kind :) but, lets see whos nice enough to answer me in a good manner. :D

Another noob question to hit you with: How do i download the file to decompile it :/[/quote]
Follow the source to a jar file, jar files are called in HTML with

item.source: Deobing Java in its various forms :/

item.title: Deobing Java in its various forms :/
item.dc:creator: @hidendra Hidendra
item.description:
@hidendra wrote:

If newer versions of the new RS client hasn’t already been deobbed then I doubt it will be for a while; you see, when you obfuscate it you encrypt the source with a “password”, so you need that password to decompile it.
Some Java games wont be obfuscated, so you can try decompiling them, a popular and good decompiler is Jad. Google it.

Read full topic
